summary: You can add the magic for followers.
descriptionHtml:
You can add the magic for followers.
Not change the followers, you can also use other mod.
But because it is not a little debugging, this is a beta version.

===Hirelings===
Belrand
Erik the Slayer
Jenassa
Marcurio
Stenvar
Vorstag

===Housecarls===

Calder

Jordis the Sword-Maiden

===Alteration===
OakFlesh
StoneFlesh
IronFlesh
EbonyFlesh
Dragonhide

===Conjuration===
ConjureFamiliar
ConjureFlameAtronach
FlamingFamiliar
ConjureFrostAtronach
ConjureStormAtronach
DreadZombie
ConjureDragonPriest
ConjureDremoraLord
ConjureWispMother (corpse is left)

===Restoration===
Healing
FastHealing
CloseWounds
WardLesser
WardSteadFast
WardGreater

===Destruction===
Flames
Frostbite
Sparks
FireBolt
IceSpike
LightningBolt
FlameCloak
FrostCloak
LightningCloak
FireBall
IceStorm
Chainlightning
Incinerate
IcySpear
ThunderBolt
WallofFlame
WallofFrost
WallofStorms
SpectralArrow
SprigganSpray

Followers used in preference to the stronger magic.

===BoundWeapons===
BoundSwordRightHand Normal/Flame/Frost/Spark 
BoundSwordLeftHand Normal/Flame/Frost/Spark  (Dual Wield)
DualBoundSword Normal/Flame/Frost/Spark  (Dual Wield)
BoundBattleAxe Normal/Flame/Frost/Spark 
BoundBow Normal/Flame/Frost/Spark 

PlayerVersion =>> \"Recolor Bound Weapons\" http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34624

Follower can use only one of these, and last selected three follower only can use BoundWeapons.
If BoundSwordLeftHand selected, the follower should be had with other one-handed weapon. 


If the follower does not use magic:

Remove follower weapons.
Select \"RemoveDefaultEquipment\"
Use the optional file.(last load order)


===Version===
Version 0.4b
Add New BoundWeapons
(If you were using the previous version, please select the \"ResetAll\") 

Version 0.3b
BoundWeapon Fix to become not visible.
(It may still not be visible for about 10 seconds.)

Version 0.2b
Add Spells
Support All Followers

Version 0.1b
First Version
author: liny
